channel.title: Daily Express :: Tech Feed
channel.description: Simply The Best 7 Days A Week

item.title: Millions of Windows laptops infected with ‘unremovable’ malware - are you affected?
item.description: WINDOWS users are being put on alert after security experts discovered malware on millions of laptops that is virtually impossible to remove. If you're wondering whether your device is affected and how to stay safe then here's what you need to know.

item.title: Best Sky TV Deals: Get Discounts On Sky Glass And Sky Q Packages
item.description: HUNTING for the best Sky TV deal can be tough. First, you'll need to choose between the brilliant Sky Q box and the newer Sky Glass to watch Sky TV, then pick between the various packages, including Sky Sports, BT Sports, and Sky Cinema. To make things even more confusing, there are also a number of extras, like a Disney+ subscription, to contemplate too. But we're here to help! Express.co.uk has rounded up the best deals on Sky TV packages today to ensure you never pay full price...

item.title: Best VPN Deals 2022: Protect Your Privacy With These Money Saving Offers
item.description: ARE you looking to sign up to a virtual private network to help safeguard your privacy online? If so you'll want to check out the best VPN deals that leading service providers are running in 2022.

item.title: Apple AirPods Pro review: These noise-cancelling earbuds hit all of the right notes
item.description: Apple's hugely-popular AirPods are back with a new Pro edition, which feature a refreshed design, Spatial Audio, wireless charging as standard, and all-important noise-cancelling technology. So if you're thinking of investing in a pair then here is our full Apple AirPods Pro review.

item.title: Budget TV boost! Sonos could launch a much cheaper soundbar next month
item.description: SONOS is rumoured to be working on a new soundbar that will boost the audio from your TV for a much cheaper price.

item.title: Best AirPods Deals (April 2022): Get The Lowest Prices On Apple Earbuds
item.description: HUNTING for the best AirPods deal in the UK? These wireless earbuds are a hugely popular accessory for iPhone owners, thanks to the seamless wireless pairing, clever Spatial Audio sound, wireless charging case, and water-resistant design. However, AirPods don't come cheap - so you'll want to find the best offers and discounts to drop the price tag. Here's everything you need to know...

item.title: iPhone warning: The EU gets one step closer to making your Apple chargers useless
item.description: THE European Union has moved a step closer to making sure all tech companies use USB-C as the standard port for charging on their smartphones and tablets and it's bad news for iPhone owners.

item.title: Disney+ For Free: Can You Get A Free Trial With Disney+?
item.description: DISNEY+ is one of the most popular services around, with tonnes of great exclusive content available to stream online. If you're interested in Disney+ you may be wondering if you can try out a free trial for the Netflix and Prime Video rival? And if so how can you get a Disney+ free trial? If you've got these questions and more then Express.co.uk is here to help...

item.title: Best VPN For Streaming: Unblock Streaming Movies, TV and Sports From Around The World
item.description: LOOKING for the best VPN to swerve geo blocking and access streaming sites unavailable in your country? We've put together a list of the ultimate VPN services to access an unblocked Netflix subscription, Prime Video, Disney+, HBO Max, and more. Not only that, but these VPNs will let you watch sports fixtures that aren't available in your location, thanks to VPN server locations across the globe. Here's what you need to know.

item.title: AirPods (3rd generation) review: Apple has given you a tough choice to make
item.description: APPLE is back with some new 3rd generation AirPods that get bigger sound, more power and a new more design. Should you invest? Here's our full AirPods 2021 review.
